long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You love fresh ideas and want to have them nicely integrated in your browser? Then this extension is for you!

Features:
* will highlight "Fired!" ideas with fire icon
* Shows the 15 best ideas from firespotting.com
* A popup will show you the new 1st place idea
* One click to show the comments of the idea
* Open ideas in new tab
